description: [Application Load Balancers] Modify the IP pool associated to a load balancer.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the load balancer.

parameters.name: IpamPools
parameters.description: The IPAM pools to be modified. Ipv4IpamPoolId (string) --- The ID of the IPv4 IPAM pool.

nested_params.name: Ipv4IpamPoolId
nested_params.description: The ID of the IPv4 IPAM pool.

parameters.name: RemoveIpamPools
parameters.description: Remove the IP pools in use by the load balancer. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Ipv4IpamPoolId
nested_items.description: The ID of the IPv4 IPAM pool.
